scripts.deploy_localnet: sui client switch --env localnet && cross-env NODE_ENV=localnet MVR_FALLBACK_NETWORK=testnet pnpm exec ts-node ./src/scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy_devnet: sui client switch --env devnet && cross-env NODE_ENV=devnet MVR_FALLBACK_NETWORK=testnet pnpm exec ts-node ./src/scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy_testnet: sui client switch --env testnet && cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet pnpm exec ts-node ./src/scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy_mainnet: sui client switch --env mainnet && cross-env NODE_ENV=mainnet pnpm exec ts-node ./src/scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy_bytes_localnet: sui client switch --env localnet && cross-env NODE_ENV=localnet MVR_FALLBACK_NETWORK=testnet pnpm exec ts-node ./src/scripts/getDeployBytes.ts
scripts.deploy_bytes_devnet: sui client switch --env devnet && cross-env NODE_ENV=devnet MVR_FALLBACK_NETWORK=testnet pnpm exec ts-node ./src/scripts/getDeployBytes.ts
scripts.deploy_bytes_testnet: sui client switch --env testnet && cross-env NODE_ENV=testnet MVR_FALLBACK_NETWORK=testnet pnpm exec ts-node ./src/scripts/getDeployBytes.ts
scripts.deploy_bytes_mainnet: sui client switch --env mainnet && cross-env NODE_ENV=mainnet MVR_FALLBACK_NETWORK=testnet pnpm exec ts-node ./src/scripts/getDeployBytes.ts
